marker.ph: /// return the current state of AI ...
/// When we do the tap movement on a hologram ...

/// When we gaze out the hologram ...
/// Function for checking if the AI is moving (used for setting the animation) ...
/// Function for create a visual sensor on the object ...
/// Function for create a RAINAspectr on the object ...
/// Function called when the AI entre in the safe zone ...
/* private AIMContext AimContext; ... */
/* AimContext = gameObject.GetComponent<AIMContext>(); ... */
/// Method called by Micheal when the IA enter in the danger zone ...
/// Method called by the KeywordHandler when the player say "Police", this method set the state of the civilian ...
/// Set the state to run if the current state is normal or panic ...
/// Called when we do a tap movement on the hologram, this function will call OnSelect(); ...
/// When a IA ENTER in the collider, if he is a Civilian, say him he is in danger ...
/// When a IA IS in the collider, say him he is in danger ...
/// Stop the movement of the AI and call the methode SayRassuring ...
/// Called when we do a tap movement on the hologram, this function will call OnSelect(); ...
/// set the state to arrested ...
/// Set the state to caught when the shooter enter in the safe zone ...
/// Method called by the KeywordHandler when the player say "Stop", this method set the state of the shooter ...

/// set the state to run if he is not saved ...
